content.text: Match ends, Manchester United 3, Basel 3.
Second Half ends, Manchester United 3, Basel 3.
Attempt missed. Dimitar Berbatov (Manchester United) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Danny Welbeck.
Attempt missed. Aleksandar Dragovic (Basel) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Cabral.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Markus Steinhöfer (Basel) because of an injury.
Delay in match Ashley Young (Manchester United) because of an injury.
Markus Steinhöfer (Basel) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ashley Young (Manchester United).
Attempt missed. Danny Welbeck (Manchester United) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nani with a cross.
Goal!  Manchester United 3, Basel 3. Ashley Young (Manchester United) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Nani with a cross.
Foul by Pak Kwang-Ryong (Basel).
Phil Jones (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Basel. Taulant Xhaka replaces Alexander Frei.
Offside, Manchester United. Michael Carrick tries a through ball, but Dimitar Berbatov is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Dimitar Berbatov (Manchester United) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Phil Jones with a through ball.
Nani (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Joo-Ho Park (Basel).
Foul by Joo-Ho Park (Basel).
Dimitar Berbatov (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Manchester United. Michael Carrick tries a through ball, but Nani is caught offside.
Foul by Park Ji-Sung (Manchester United).
Alexander Frei (Basel) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Manchester United. Dimitar Berbatov replaces Anderson.
Attempt saved. Ashley Young (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Anderson.
Substitution, Basel. Pak Kwang-Ryong replaces Marco Streller.
Patrice Evra (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jacques Zoua (Basel).
Substitution, Basel. Scott Chipperfield replaces Fabian Frei.
Goal!  Manchester United 2, Basel 3. Alexander Frei (Basel) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty conceded by Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Basel. Marco Streller draws a foul in the penalty area.
Granit Xhaka (Basel) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Granit Xhaka (Basel).
Substitution, Manchester United. Nani replaces Fabio.
Foul by Markus Steinhöfer (Basel).
Ashley Young (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Fabio (Manchester United) because of an injury.
Jacques Zoua (Basel) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Fabio (Manchester United).
Substitution, Manchester United. Park Ji-Sung replaces Ryan Giggs.
Goal!  Manchester United 2, Basel 2. Alexander Frei (Basel) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Fabian Frei with a cross following a fast break.
Ashley Young (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Markus Steinhöfer (Basel).
Goal!  Manchester United 2, Basel 1. Fabian Frei (Basel) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner following a corner.
Attempt saved. Marco Streller (Basel) header from a difficult angle on the left is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Alexander Frei with a cross.
Corner,  Basel. Conceded by Fabio.
Attempt missed. Danny Welbeck (Manchester United) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Antonio Valencia with a cross.
Attempt saved. Ryan Giggs (Manchester United) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ashley Young.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Joo-Ho Park.
Attempt blocked. Granit Xhaka (Basel) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Cabral.
Corner,  Basel. Conceded by David de Gea.
Attempt saved. Marco Streller (Basel) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jacques Zoua.
Offside, Manchester United. David de Gea tries a through ball, but Antonio Valencia is caught offside.
Offside, Manchester United. Antonio Valencia tries a through ball, but Ashley Young is caught offside.
Second Half begins Manchester United 2, Basel 0.
First Half ends, Manchester United 2, Basel 0.
Offside, Manchester United. Anderson tries a through ball, but Antonio Valencia is caught offside.
Attempt missed. Marco Streller (Basel) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Joo-Ho Park with a cross.
Attempt saved. Antonio Valencia (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Patrice Evra.

Goal!  Manchester United 2, Basel 0. Danny Welbeck (Manchester United) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ryan Giggs with a through ball.
